translations: n.疗养院，休养地（sanitarium 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Many mutual-aid societies branched out and founded their own hospitals and sanitariums.
sentences.translation: 许多互助会社还创办自己的医院和疗养院。

sentences.sentence: The medical services, medicine, ward lodging and meals provided by hospitals, clinics and sanitariums.
sentences.translation: 医院、诊所、疗养院提供之医疗劳务、药品、病房之住宿及膳食。

sentences.sentence: As one of the four major hot-spring sanitariums in China, Tangshan hot-spring is situated at Tangshan town, Jiangning area, Nanjing.
sentences.translation: 汤山温泉是全国四大温泉疗养区之一。它地处南京江宁区汤山镇。
